region.invalidPoint: Invalid point ID. Must be 1 or 2.
region.invalidManualPoint: Invalid manual point format. Use X:Y.
region.hitBlock: Hit a block to set point {0}.
tileprotect.tileProtected: This area is protected and you don't have permission to modify it.
region.addMember: Add a member to a region
region.removeMember: Remove a member from a region
region.setOwner: Set the owner of a region
region.protect: Set protection flags for a region
region.superProtect: Set super protection flags for a region
region.enterMessagesList: List messages shown when entering a region
region.enterMessagesInsert: Add a message shown when entering a region
region.enterCommandsList: List commands executed when entering a region
region.enterCommandsInsert: Add a command executed when entering a region
region.leaveMessagesList: List messages shown when leaving a region
region.leaveMessagesInsert: Add a message shown when leaving a region
region.leaveCommandsList: List commands executed when leaving a region
region.leaveCommandsInsert: Add a command executed when leaving a region
region.autogodmode: Toggle automatic god mode in region
